item.title: What could go wrong?
item.description: When dealing with software, stuff — be it technicalor human— quite inexorably go wrong at some point for a variety of reasons. Here is a ‘memo’ list of shit that I lived or witnessed and hopefully ways to prevent them. Some points might look totally obvious but as I experienced them at least once they are probably worth listing. This is not intended to be a list of technical difficulties encountered during the development phase but a reminder of what to think about before starting to code:
